queries: The subordinate hand can also be a Point handshape or another Soon handshape.
verbLexeme: 1. To open a bottle of champagne; to pop the cork on a bottle of champagne.
nominalLexeme: 1. An expensive white wine that has lots of bubbles in it. People usually drink it when they are celebrating a wedding, birthday, and so on. English = champagne.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: popping a champagne cork.
